creditline: The C. Curtis Dunnavan Fund for the Purchase of Asian Art
description: curled leaf; red on exterior, brown on interior; some intentional holes
signed: at interior near stem, in red: (untranslated); to right of signature, in red: 2015
text: To date, this is Muramoto’s largest work from the ethereal Wing of Foliage series. While its red color confirms its identity as a lacquer object, the intentional irregular holes and imperfections give it the natural appearance of a leaf.
title: Wing of Foliage: Bending in the Wind
